entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
